8078.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
tosdr.tldr: This privacy policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in www.upakka.com. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

8079.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
tosdr.tldr:
Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

This website does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
